attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present it is extremly difficult for young people to get on the property ladder even if they are quite well paid. The PM should be making it easier for young people to get on the property ladder. It should also make a limit on the number of homes an individual can own. Why should people be able to buy as many holiday homes as they want when they dont spend much time there, please tax these people more

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
